titleStmt.title: The picture of a true protestant: or, Gods house and husbandry wherein is declared the duty and dignitie of all Gods children, both minister and people. Written by Thomas Tuke.
titleStmt.author: Tuke, Thomas, d. 1657.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, and are to be sold by Thomas Archer in Popes head Pallace, neere the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
